SectionShowcase.heading2: NOBODY DOES IT QUITE LIKE US

01.title: Photography, styling, product animation
01.description: We shot their pastries so you can almost smell them through the screen. Every detail appetizing, every frame delicious.

02.title: “Sofiyska Banitsa Live”, “Sea of Banitsa”, Lie detector
02.description: At Kaboom, we create campaigns with a real lie detector, talented musicians, and a replica of the TV show “Sea of Love” — only with pies.

03.title: Complete brand identity and design
03.description: We built a complete visual world – colors, fonts, graphics. Consistent, memorable, tasteful. Including the interiors and exteriors of every bakery.

04.title: Ad campaigns and social media content
04.description: We started showing people, not just products. Because people can say “it’s delicious” – pies can’t.

05.title: Packaging, vehicle branding
05.description: We designed their packaging and entire fleet – from supermarket shelves to the streets, everything speaks with one voice.

06.title: Developing their first digital marketing strategy
06.description: We created their first-ever digital strategy – a plan that works and delivers measurable results.

07.title: Box Design
07.description: We create dozens of promotional box designs, each with its own personality and style.

08.title: TVC Adaptation
08.description: We animate, voice, and adapt TV spots for all their brands – Avene, Elgydium, Eludril, and more.

09.title: Video Production for Social Media and TV
09.description: Direction, planning, models, shots – everything to make products and brands shine.

10.title: 3D Animation
10.description: We create 3D models and animations of products that then come alive in social media and TV spots.

11.title: Adaptation of All Video Materials
11.description: No matter the complexity – we adapt everything for Avene, Ducray, Elgydium, Eludril, Rene Furterer, Klorane, and more.

12.title: Creating BTL Campaigns
12.description: Concept, planning, execution – their BTL campaigns are designed to make noise on very modest budgets.

13.title: Direction of Clips for National TV
13.description: We created concepts and directed clips for bTV that engage and impress.

14.title: Creating Engaging Formats
14.description: Clips in studios, offices, outdoors – formats that unite teams and audiences.

15.title: OOH, Windows, and Vehicles
15.description: ERA takes pride in Kaboom’s designs, whether it’s posters, shop windows, or vehicles.

16.title: Social Media Content
16.description: We travel to capture the action from the epicenter of the event — no matter which of their 44 offices across the country it is.

17.title: Creating Engaging Campaigns
17.description: For example, the “20 Years / Move up!” campaign with an entire volleyball team, which we film and then transform into key visuals for calendars, posts, and window displays.

18.title: Creating BTL Campaigns
18.description: For example, a podcast—even one in a moving car, a Wheel of Fortune, a broker battle…

competence.title: COMPETENCE
competence.content: Kaboom is guided by principles borrowed from a leading German advertising agency. Marketing, design, typography, direction: this is what we have studied! That’s why we know what we do and leave nothing to chance.

qa.title: QUALITY ASSURANCE
qa.content: We have an unshakable fixation on quality — we strive to offer a service that completely transforms our clients’ perception of how good their marketing could be.

kaizen.title: KAIZEN
kaizen.content: Every day at Kaboom, we strive for the maximum — higher quality and better service. Spot a weakness — we fix it. See an opportunity for improvement — we seize it.

heart.title: WORKING WITH HEART
heart.content: We do what we do because we love our work. Ever since we were children, we have been drawing, writing, creating. We experience our clients’ successes as our own. We work with heart — and it shows!

cool.title: COOL PEOPLE
cool.content: All our strengths would mean nothing if we weren’t fresh, smiling, and genuine — people who, we like to believe, could be not only your partners but also your friends :)

SectionTestimonials.subtext: From real estate to cosmetics, industrial sector and healthcare, even ecology. Whatever your business, at Kaboom you will receive quality.
